alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Jefferson; Shelby; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tuscaloosa, west central Shelby, north central Bibb and southwestern Jefferson Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 545 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tannehill Ironworks State Park, or 11 miles west of Helena. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bessemer, Lake View, Brookwood, Vance, Woodstock, North Johns, Tannehill Ironworks State Park, Lake Wildwood, Bull City, Abernant, Mercedes Benz Of Alabama, North Bibb, McCalla, Promenade Tannehill, East Brookwood, Bucksville, Weller, Bent Brook Golf Club, McAdory and Green Pond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
